title: It is the hand of God on the wall,
lyrics: It is the hand of God on the wall, It is the hand of God on the wall, It is the hand of God on the wall It is the hand of God That's writing on the wall, Prodigal Sons and daughters Come home, Prodigal Sons and daughters come home, Prodigal Sons and daughters come home, It is the hand of God That's writing on the wall.
